003892BF.desc:
Casting a {c_important}Storm{/c} Skill increases the Critical Strike Chance of your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skill by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%+|]{/c}.

Casting an {c_important}Earth{/c} Skill increases the Critical Strike Damage of your next {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skill by {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c}.

7786FD97.Buff1_Description: Your next {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skill has increased Critical Strike Chance.

C6E60718.Buff2_Description: Your next {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skill has increased Critical Strike Damage.
